sections.markdown:
# LAB : Magic Lookup
In this lab, we use 3 datasources 
  - file1 contains `start_time` and `betID` 
  - file2 contains `betID` and `runID`
  - file3 contains `runID` and `end_time`

## Questions 

-  Calculate the delay payment

    ``delay_payment=end_time-start_time``

- Calculate the SLO 

    ``Objective = 99% of delay_payment < 6m on default period``

- Create the workflow 'if SLO failed' 

    ``Send the result on webhook``  
    ``Ingest result on your tenant``

![Delay_payment](https://github.com/JLLormeau/reconnect2023/blob/main/delay_payment.png?raw=true)

## File 1: Gain shared with winners
contains `start_time`, `betID`

-  display the result

input.value:
data 
    record(timestamp=now()-45m, log.source="file1", content="betID=BET_20231019160000, start_time=20231019160000986, winners=65"),
    record(timestamp=now()-30m, log.source="file1", content="betID=BET_20231019161501, start_time=20231019161501986, winners=47"),
    record(timestamp=now()-15m, log.source="file1", content="betID=BET_20231019163101, start_time=20231019163101986, winners=118")
| parse content,"'betID=' WORD:betID ', start_time='TIMESTAMP('yyyyMMddHHmmssSSS'):start_time ', winners='INT:nbr_winners"
| fields start_time, betID, nbr_winners

grail.canonicalQuery:
data record({timestamp = now() - 45m}, {log.source = "file1"}, {content = "betID=BET_20231019160000, start_time=20231019160000986, winners=65"}), record({timestamp = now() - 30m}, {log.source = "file1"}, {content = "betID=BET_20231019161501, start_time=20231019161501986, winners=47"}), record({timestamp = now() - 15m}, {log.source = "file1"}, {content = "betID=BET_20231019163101, start_time=20231019163101986, winners=118"})
| parse content, "'betID=' WORD:betID ', start_time='TIMESTAMP('yyyyMMddHHmmssSSS'):start_time ', winners='INT:nbr_winners"
| fields start_time, betID, nbr_winners
| limit 0
grail.query:
data 
    record(timestamp=now()-45m, log.source="file1", content="betID=BET_20231019160000, start_time=20231019160000986, winners=65"),
    record(timestamp=now()-30m, log.source="file1", content="betID=BET_20231019161501, start_time=20231019161501986, winners=47"),
    record(timestamp=now()-15m, log.source="file1", content="betID=BET_20231019163101, start_time=20231019163101986, winners=118")
| parse content,"'betID=' WORD:betID ', start_time='TIMESTAMP('yyyyMMddHHmmssSSS'):start_time ', winners='INT:nbr_winners"
| fields start_time, betID, nbr_winners
| limit 0

- display the result with the runID and betID correlation

    record(timestamp=now()-28m, log.source="file2", content="betID=BET_20231019161501, runID=2023101900055"),

sections.markdown:
## QUESTION 1.1 : create a lookup with file2 and file3 based on runID
For multiple lookups, it's easier to start by the end. 
- fill the `<value>` below to create the lookup with `file2` and `file3` based on `runID` and catch the lookup field `end_time`
- display the result on `betID`, `runID`, `end_time`

input.value:
//file2
data 
    record(timestamp=now()-43m, log.source="file2", content="betID=BET_20231019160000, runID=2023101900045"),
    record(timestamp=now()-28m, log.source="file2", content="betID=BET_20231019161501, runID=2023101900055"),
    record(timestamp=now()-12m, log.source="file2", content="betID=BET_20231019163101, runID=2023101900065")
| parse content,"'betID=' WORD:betID ', runID=' WORD:runID"
| fields timestamp, betID, runID
| lookup[
        //file3
        data 
            record(timestamp=now()-41m, log.source="file3", content="runID=2023101900045, end_time=2023/10/19 16:01:30"),
            record(timestamp=now()-26m, log.source="file3", content="runID=2023101900055, end_time=2023/10/19 16:18:00"),
            record(timestamp=now()-10m, log.source="file3", content="runID=2023101900065, end_time=2023/10/19 16:38:30")
        | parse content,"'runID=' WORD:runID ', end_time='TIMESTAMP('yyyy/MM/d HH:mm:ss'):end_time"
        ], sourceField: runID, lookupField: runID, fields:{end_time}
| fields betID,runID, end_time
//solution hidden
| fields solution="the solution is hidden here"
| limit 1

grail.canonicalQuery:
data record({timestamp = now() - 43m}, {log.source = "file2"}, {content = "betID=BET_20231019160000, runID=2023101900045"}), record({timestamp = now() - 28m}, {log.source = "file2"}, {content = "betID=BET_20231019161501, runID=2023101900055"}), record({timestamp = now() - 12m}, {log.source = "file2"}, {content = "betID=BET_20231019163101, runID=2023101900065"})
| parse content, "'betID=' WORD:betID ', runID=' WORD:runID"
| fields timestamp, betID, runID
| lookup 
	[
		data record({timestamp = now() - 41m}, {log.source = "file3"}, {content = "runID=2023101900045, end_time=2023/10/19 16:01:30"}), record({timestamp = now() - 26m}, {log.source = "file3"}, {content = "runID=2023101900055, end_time=2023/10/19 16:18:00"}), record({timestamp = now() - 10m}, {log.source = "file3"}, {content = "runID=2023101900065, end_time=2023/10/19 16:38:30"})
		| parse content, "'runID=' WORD:runID ', end_time='TIMESTAMP('yyyy/MM/d HH:mm:ss'):end_time"
	], sourceField:runID, lookupField:runID, fields:{end_time}
| fields betID, runID, end_time
| fields "the solution is hidden here", alias:solution
| limit 1
grail.query:
//file2
data 
    record(timestamp=now()-43m, log.source="file2", content="betID=BET_20231019160000, runID=2023101900045"),
    record(timestamp=now()-28m, log.source="file2", content="betID=BET_20231019161501, runID=2023101900055"),
    record(timestamp=now()-12m, log.source="file2", content="betID=BET_20231019163101, runID=2023101900065")
| parse content,"'betID=' WORD:betID ', runID=' WORD:runID"
| fields timestamp, betID, runID
| lookup[
        //file3
        data 
            record(timestamp=now()-41m, log.source="file3", content="runID=2023101900045, end_time=2023/10/19 16:01:30"),
            record(timestamp=now()-26m, log.source="file3", content="runID=2023101900055, end_time=2023/10/19 16:18:00"),
            record(timestamp=now()-10m, log.source="file3", content="runID=2023101900065, end_time=2023/10/19 16:38:30")
        | parse content,"'runID=' WORD:runID ', end_time='TIMESTAMP('yyyy/MM/d HH:mm:ss'):end_time"
        ], sourceField: runID, lookupField: runID, fields:{end_time}
| fields betID,runID, end_time
//solution hidden
| fields solution="the solution is hidden here"
| limit 1

input.value:
//file2
data 
    record(timestamp=now()-43m, log.source="file2", content="betID=BET_20231019160000, runID=2023101900045"),
    record(timestamp=now()-28m, log.source="file2", content="betID=BET_20231019161501, runID=2023101900055"),
    record(timestamp=now()-12m, log.source="file2", content="betID=BET_20231019163101, runID=2023101900065")
| parse content,"'betID=' WORD:betID ', runID=' WORD:runID"
| fields timestamp, betID, runID
| lookup[
        //file3
        data 
            record(timestamp=now()-41m, log.source="file3", content="runID=2023101900045, end_time=2023/10/19 16:01:30"),
            record(timestamp=now()-26m, log.source="file3", content="runID=2023101900055, end_time=2023/10/19 16:18:00"),
            record(timestamp=now()-10m, log.source="file3", content="runID=2023101900065, end_time=2023/10/19 16:38:30")
        | parse content,"'runID=' WORD:runID ', end_time='TIMESTAMP('yyyy/MM/d HH:mm:ss'):end_time"
        ], sourceField: runID, lookupField: runID, fields:{end_time}
| fields betID,runID, end_time
//solution hidden
| fields solution="the solution is hidden here"
| limit 1

sections.markdown:
## QUESTION 1.2 : create a lookup with file1 and the previous lookup based on betID
- fill the `<value>` below to create the lookup with `file1` and `result_1.1` based on `betID` and catch the lookup fields `runID` and `end_time`  
- display the result `start_time`, `betID`, `runID`, `delay_payment` = ( `end_time` - `start_time`)

## QUESTION 2 : Calculate the SLO 

- Objective = 99% of delay_payment < 6m on default period
- fill the <value> in the DQL below to display : `SLO`, `target`, `SLO_success` (true if SLO > target, false if not), `nbr_failed`, `total`

input.value:
<result_1.2>
//SLO Calulation
| summarize nbr_failed=countIf(delay_payment > 6m), total=count()
| fieldsAdd SLO=(toDouble(total - nbr_failed) * 100 / total), target=99
| fields <value1>, <value>, <value3>, <value4>, <value5>

sections.markdown:
# QUESTION 3 : Create Workflow
Create a workflow based on the DQL <Result_2>

- with the fields : `SLO`, `target`, `SLO_success`, `nbr_failed`, `total`

# QUESTION 3_1: Send a webhook if SLO failed

## Add a condition 
   ``````
   HTTP Request 
   ``````
## INPUT  
   ``````
   POST
   ``````
   
   ``````
   https://webhook.site/b5c16a6f-f194-4e10-9e3f-c5939d873b74`
   ``````
   
   ``````
   {
   "name": "<yourname>",
   "SLO_success": "{{ result("execute_dql_query_1").records[0].SLO_success }}",  
   "SLO": "{{ result("execute_dql_query_1").records[0].SLO }}",  
   "target": "{{ result("execute_dql_query_1").records[0].target }}",  
   "nbr_failed": "{{ result("execute_dql_query_1").records[0].nbr_failed }}"  
   }
   ``````

## CONDITIONS
  ``````
  {{ result("execute_dql_query_1").records[0].SLO_success == False }}
  ``````
